text: Sphingomonas glacialis is a Gram-positive, rod-shaped, psychrophilic and non- motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from cryoconite from the Stubai Glacier in Tyrol in Austria.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas glacialis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase glacialis Category:Bacteria described in 2011 Category:Psychrophiles
title: Sphingomonas glacialis
